name: stencil-component-source
description: A sample stencil + angular + react application

scripts.dev:angular: npm run build:core && npm run start:angular
scripts.dev:react: npm run build:core && npm run start:react
scripts.build:docs-app: npm run build:usage-data && cd docs-app && npm run build
scripts.start:docs-app: npm run build:usage-data && cd docs-app && npm start
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:core && npm run build:core && npm run install:angular && npm run install:react
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf node_modules && npm run clean:core && npm run clean:angular && npm run clean:react
scripts.clean:core: cd core && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf dist
scripts.build-publish:core: npm run build:core && cd core && npm publish

author: Shripal Soni
